synopsis.text: One day, fraternal twins Megumu and Mitsuru Kobayashi decide to swap schools for a change of pace. Megumu, disguised as her brother, finds herself in a school full of delinquents, while Mitsuru enjoys the co-ed environment of his sister's school. As they navigate their new surroundings, unexpected romantic entanglements arise. Megumu, posing as her brother, shares a kiss with upperclassman Aoi Sanada, leaving him questioning his feelings. Meanwhile, Mitsuru finds himself in a tender moment with the school's queen bee, Azusa Tokugawa. As the twins' secret remains hidden, their relationships blossom, adding a layer of complexity to their deception. Will they be able to maintain their charade, or will their secret tear their newfound romances apart? Join Megumu and Mitsuru in 'Kobayashi ga Kawai sugite Tsurai!!' to find out.
